name: BassAnly (フォルテアナザー)
locations: Defeat Bass SP in Graveyard Area.

name: MetrKnuk (メテオナックル)
locations: Obtain from email when you enter the Graveyard Area.

name: CrossDiv (クロスディバイド)

name: HubBatc (サイトバッチ)
locations: Defeat Bass BX in Underground Area 2.

name: BgDthThd (バグデスサンダー)
description: Use Bug Frag with DrkThnd! (Thunder; if 0 Bug Frags remained)
locations: Purchase from BugFrag Trader in Sky Area 1 for 100 BugFrags.
